paper_abstract: This paper shows that case-based reasoning (CBR), an artificial intelligence technique, is a quite efficient tool in monitoring financial market against its possible collapse. For this purpose, daily financial condition indicator (DFCI) monitoring financial market is built on CBR and its performance is compared to DFCI on neural network. This study is empirically done for the Korean financial market. (C) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Financial market monitoring by case-based reasoning
